definitions.definition: To act as a wardrobe department , to provide clothing or sets of clothes .
Ordering a clothing item online and returning it for a refund after having worn it.
Ordering multiple sizes of the same clothing item online and returning all but the one that fits best.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To act as a wardrobe department , to provide clothing or sets of clothes .
secondary_definitions: Ordering a clothing item online and returning it for a refund after having worn it.
Ordering multiple sizes of the same clothing item online and returning all but the one that fits best.
